availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Kennedy (Todd County, Kentucky, wool carder)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, wool carder. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Peden Kennedy on July 29, 1823. Married to L. M. Kennedy. Married to Mariah Willoughby Kennedy on December 5, 1861. Father of Laura Kennedy. Wool carder in Todd County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 10. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 4, p. 14. Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Todd County, 1823. Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Todd County, Kentucky, 1861. Find A Grave, "William Thompson Kennedy (1805-1877)," Memorial #47516878, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47516878/william-thompson-kennedy (accessed March 23, 2017).
